mapper.select:
SELECT B.COMPANION_NO, M.UNO, B.DEPATURE_DATE, B.CLOSE_DATE, B.CONTENT, B.AREA, B.POST_DATE, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.STATUS FROM COMM_COMPANION B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.UNO = M.UNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.DEPATURE_DATE >= SYSDATE
AND B.DEPATURE_DATE >= #{departureDate}
AND B.AREA LIKE '%'||#{area}||'%'
ORDER BY B.NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_COMPANION B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.UNO = M.UNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.DEPATURE_DATE >= SYSDATE
AND B.DEPATURE_DATE >= #{departureDate}
AND B.AREA LIKE '%'||#{area}||'%'
ORDER BY B.NO DESC

SELECT B.COMMENT_NO, B.COMPANION_NO, M2.UNO AS SENDER_NO, M2.U_NAME SENDER_NAME, M2.U_AVATAR SENDER_IMG, B.MSG_SEND, M.UNO AS RECEIVER_NO, M.U_NAME AS RECEIVER_NAME, M.U_AVATAR AS RECEIVER_IMG, B.MSG_REC, B.POST_DATE, B.STATUS FROM companion_comment B LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.RECEIVER_NO = M.UNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(B.SENDER_NO = M2.UNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.COMPANION_NO = #{companionNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMM_COMPANION ( COMPANION_NO, UNO, DEPATURE_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, CONTENT, AREA, POST_DATE, BOARD_TYPE, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMP_NO.NEXTVAL, #{uNo}, #{departureDate}, #{closeDate}, #{content}, #{area}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )

INSERT INTO COMPANION_COMMENT ( COMMENT_NO, COMPANION_NO, SENDER_NO, MSG_SEND, RECEIVER_NO, MSG_REC, POST_DATE, STATUS )VALUES( SEQ_COMP_SC_NO.NEXTVAL, #{companionNo}, #{senderNo}, #{msgSend}, #{receiverNo}, #{msgRec},SYSDATE, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMM_COMPANION SET STATUS='N' WHERE COMPANION_NO=#{companionNo}
